content: I think I'll go with an unflavored option. I like the idea of being able to customize the flavor myself. By the way, I've been really enjoying experimenting with different types of plant-based milk and I'm glad I found oat milk as my favorite. It's so creamy! I recently took a vegan cooking class at a local culinary school and learned how to make vegan lasagna and mac and cheese using a cashew-based sauce, which was amazing.
